---
title: "Solarafold"
image: "thumbnail.png"
date: "2024-05-12"

---

Solarafold is a [solara](https://solara.dev/) based viewer for alphafold3 modelling results. Users can upload their alphafold3 `.zip` result file and view resulting models with [ipymolstar](https://github.com/Jhsmit/ipymolstar).

For full screen and source code head over to the [HuggingFace space](https://huggingface.co/spaces/Jhsmit/solarafold/tree/main).
